a.xlink:title: Adds a new InputCombinationElement to the InputCondition.
Checks if the condition is fulfilled.
Sets the new required InputCombination to trigger the InputCondition.
Uses a parsable string to define the InputCombination <DOCUMENT>
Check if a given item is in the given std::vector.
Splits a std::string using a delimited.
Replace all the occurences of search to replace in the string subject in place.
Get a InputButton that is inside the AllKeys Map.
Replace all the occurences of search to replace in the string subject.
Raises an Error loaded in the Aube Error Database (AED)
Gets the File where is located the ErrorMessage when raised.
Gets the location of the error in the code.
Gets the message displayed by the ErrorMessage when raised.
Gets hints that can help the error resolution.
